snippet: BARUCH--Ralph. The staff and trustees of Northwell Health (formerly North Shore-LIJ Health System) mourn the loss of Trustee Ralph Baruch. A dedicated benefactor and advocate of Lenox Hill Hospital since 1987, Ralph served on the Lenox Hill Board of Trustees and Executive Committee after the merge with Northwell. He is a recipient of the Medal of Distinction and past chair of the Development and Public Relations Committee. Ralph's friendship, philanthropic support and dedication helped Lenox Hill Hospital become one of the finest medical institutions in New York City. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Jean his children, and grand children. Mark L. Claster, Chairman, Board of Trustees, Northwell Health Michael J. Dowling, President and CEO, Northwell Health Paul B. Guenther, Chairman, Lenox Hill Executive Committee 1/3
